http://365gay.com/Newscon06/07/071306ncre.htm
 
 He now refuses that he compared homosexuality to peophila.. but that is an obvious lie. 
 
 The state party platform says: "We believe homosexual behavior is not normal and should not be taught as an acceptable 'alternative' lifestyle either in public education or in public policy."
 
 I can not believe that they actually have this is their platform. This shows that we still have many states as backwards today as they were decades ago.
 
 Aren't heterosexuals more likely to be pedophiles than homosexuals anyhow?
